author: Morgan Gstalter
title: Michelle Obama encourages in-person Wisconsin voters to 'prioritize' safety
description: Former first lady Michelle Obama on Tuesday encouraged Wisconsin residents to "prioritize your safety and the safety of others" if they are voting in person amid the ongoing coronavirus outbreak....
